website_summaries.verdict: This 5-cup blender comes with loads of extras to simplify your time in the kitchen. Just be sure not to put it in the dishwasher.
pros: Triple chopping blade made of surgical stainless steel
Comes with 3 mandolin inserts, whipping blade, egg white separator, storage lid, juicer insert, safety food holder and recipe book
cons: Do not put in the dishwasher
Requires a lot of force to turn, which can sometimes break the chopper

customer_reviews.title: just disappointed that it broke so soon
customer_reviews.text: One star but I don't "hate" it, just disappointed that it broke so soon. It worked great the first 6 times I used it. Broke on the seventh. I realize this is an inexpensive product and did not expect it to last decades but I did expect it to last longer than 4 months and 6 uses. Never used it for anything but salsa so, tomatoes, onion, peppers, garlic and cilantro are the only things it's seen and they were cut into pretty small pieces. Maybe mine was just defective to begin with?
customer_reviews.author: nova

customer_reviews.title: poorly made, broke on first use!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to buy this as I have used similar products in the past and this product gets good reviews on Amazon. I was very disappointed that it seems like it broke after only one use! The handle was not secure and it started making a weird clicking noise and working poorly after trying to shred just a small amount of cabbage. I would choose a different product as this one seems extremely cheaply constructed.
customer_reviews.author: cendilli

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Isn't anywhere as good as the one I purchased at the fair 15 years ago. Had to replace my old one because my dishwasher broke and melted all my plastic items because it over heated. This new one can't chop more than a fourth of an onion without the gears slipping and my old one could do a whole onion. Finally got tired of the gears slipping all to often and I bought a new one at the fair which was cheaper dollar wise but works like my first one. I threw this one away. It's just junk.
customer_reviews.author: VJ

customer_reviews.title: Be careful if you're strong
customer_reviews.text: At first I absolutely loved my salsa maker and would have given it five stars. Until I asked my husband to start a batch of salsa for me and on the first turn, the handle on the outside of the container, snapped off . While I can still use the top part to turn the blades and make salsa, I have to hold the container against myself to stabilize it. Awkward, but still works. Just be careful if you're a strong person. Go one direction with the blades, then the other, rather than forcing it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Jones

customer_reviews.title: I used to have one of these that I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: I used to have one of these that I bought at Kroger and someone washed it wrong and the top ended up holding water. These things cut up my veggies in seconds and they save me a lot of time even if you have to wash more. They cut everything the same size and you can do big or small depending on how much you turn the handle. I ordered another one on Amazon after my other one was damaged and will always have one of these on hand.
customer_reviews.author: parollins

customer_reviews.title: Best multipurpose tool for the kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Best food chopper I've ever used. I purchased a much more expensive version from Pampered Chef. I can't say enough how much better this one is. I love that it is slightly bigger than the PC. This chopper really dices things up nicely. My PC one would start to mush things up instead of dicing finely. I've also used the slicer on top to make cucumbers etc. I've since gotten rid of my mandolin slicer because this one is so much more convenient. I use this at least 5 times a week. It has so many great features and the price is amazing!!! I have since bought one for two family Mbrs and they are also in love with it
customer_reviews.author: jjknodel14

customer_reviews.title: It is a great kitchen tool to have!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for myself to make my life easier in the kitchen....but my husband uses it more than me! He uses it for EVERYTHING haha. It’s a little big and bulky and it is more dishes but it is not hard to clean and it’s very helpful. It’s also sharp so be careful. His favorite thing is shredding cheese with it and mine is whipping my eggs for scrambled eggs in the morning it makes it so quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Ockey

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to buy.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little machine. There's another one out there with straight serrated blades instead of curved, it's junk. The curved blades cut all the way through the rotation like a curved samurai blade. The straight blades just hack at the food. I make and eat a lot of salsa and it's a big money saver. If you garden, you can grow all the ingredients and save even more. This one is a replacement for one I had for years. Eventually after years of hard service I wore out the nylon gears in the lid, so it doesn't last forever. But it will pay for itself many times over during its lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: SDJeff

customer_reviews.title: Best chopper I've ever used!@
customer_reviews.text: This is the sharpest best chopper I've ever used! I even have a ninja electric one and I like this hand crank one so much better! Be careful of the blades they are extremely sharp and they will definitely cut your fingers .. be careful! I highly recommend this hand choper/mixer!!
customer_reviews.author: Whispering Eagle Landers

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This little thing really works! It’s super fast, easy to use and chops super well. I was actually surprised at how well it chopped. I was making a big batch of salsa and this gadget saved me so much time and work! It got my onion, jalapeños, green peppers and garlic diced super fine (my personal preference with salsa) with minimal effort. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: ValerieN

customer_reviews.title: NO INSTRUCTIONS INCLUDED
customer_reviews.text: Almost discarded the chopper. It is quite incredible not to include instructions in package, and the few recipes included are ridiculous. Fortunately, I watched good instructions on YouTube, so I will try the chopper, soon. Too early for me to rate the solidity and durability of the chopper.
customer_reviews.author: Cym

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like large pieces of onion, bell pepper, etc. In my food so I got this. It does a nice job at chopping those things, and really you can chop as fine or coarse as you want. Just keep cranking until you are happy. We even made salsa in it. The handle feels a little flimsy so I'm careful when spinning, and I use the middle part to turn it back and forth until there is less resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Crank stopped working with only 9mo use
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for about a year and then the crank decides to stop working so non of your food will chop/mix/etc. this is the second one I have bought (makes the BEST homemade salsa! When it works....) and it has happened to both. I am ticked to say the least. Will not be replacing a third time unfortunately....
customer_reviews.author: DFTC AZ

customer_reviews.title: Quality is bad. Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the plastic has changed color once we put it in the dishwasher. And it looks like your rusty old plastic container. I am not happy with the product. Unfortunately they don’t allow exchanges or returns. So don’t buy it.Quality is bad. Don’t buy it. Keep in mind that the instruction on the product tells you that you can put it in the dishwasher but it is not believable.
customer_reviews.author: Roozbeh Aliabadi

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: This product is awful, it did not dice or shred properly. I want expecting greatness but this was way beyond not worth the purchase. When I went to dice tomatoes it smashed them and made them into like soup (no I was not pressing to hard). The onion and carrots did not cut good at all either
customer_reviews.author: Avid Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: IDEAL FOR QUICK EASY FRESH SALSA
customer_reviews.text: I can only speak to how this works for SALSA. This year I planted my first garden. Tomato and hot pepper overload! Salsa takes less than 5 minutes to make with this (once all the ingredients are in the Chef Express less than 30 seconds)! So much better than anything at the grocery or in a restaurant. The additional attachments (and recipe book) show the versatility of this item but again, I've only used it for salsa. ONLY CON (and only reason for 4 stars)...The turning handle on top (self-powered) is slightly flimsy, if your ingredients are course and it takes some strength to turn, do so cautiously or you may break the turning piece. Other than that, amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, but cheap materials and cheap construction.
customer_reviews.text: After only using it for 3 days (yes only 3 days), the blades have started to rust! They are made of low grade steel and soap can damage them (see photo attached). Besides the top rotating handle gives way and starts rotating without rotating the blade. Good idea, but cheap materials and cheap construction.
customer_reviews.author: James007

customer_reviews.title: I loved mine and wanted to get one for my mom
customer_reviews.text: I've had a similar product for a few years now, but without the attachments. I loved mine and wanted to get one for my mom. That's how I found this one. My mom loves it and I am envious that I don't have the attachments. A great gift for someone who cooks every day as well as for an occasional cook. I am actually hoping my chopper breaks soon so I can purchase this one.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting one of these for a year and finally bought one. I couldn't be more happy. It's very simple to use and I haven't used a lot of the different part it's comes with, but I like that I have all the options. I usually just rinse them with hot water and they are clean. Perfect for mixing ingredients for omelets and salsa.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla O

customer_reviews.title: I owned the original version of this. I had ...
customer_reviews.text: I owned the original version of this. I had it for about 6 years and used it all the time. When it finally died, I decided to buy a new one. The plastic bowl is significantly cheaper than the original. I have had this less than 6 months and the bowl has already cradled and spilt and can no longer be used. I never put it in the dishwasher. I noticed hairlune fractures after the first few uses. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: EmoDancer7

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase and would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this Ultra Chef Express Manual Food Processor. I mostly use it for chopping up salad ingredients and whenever a dish calls for finely chopped or diced/ minced ingredients. I use it a LOT and it always delivers (the chopping part). The couple of times I've used other parts I wasn't real impressed, but the problems could very likely be operator error. Mostly the problem was the part just wouldn't stay in place. First one I got had a broken part, the seller sent me another one and told me to keep the old one in case one of the accessories broke. I certainly couldn't ask for better customer service than that.
customer_reviews.author: K.O.

customer_reviews.title: Great multi-use product
customer_reviews.text: I love this gadget! Works extremely well for many kitchen processes. Makes super salsa without pureeing it. Chops onions in seconds. Perfectly slices potatoes for homemade chips. I have not had a single issue. I have been using this for some time now and I really like its versatile uses. I have sliced potatoes for home chips, cucumbers for my own dill pickles. Chopped all manner of veggies and fruits. Mixed dry mixes, sauces, and drinks. Very much worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholeknc

customer_reviews.title: Inferior construction; don't expect it to last
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic mechanical gears and other parts won't last beyond a few uses. Don't even think about processing hard vegetables like potatoes, carrots, or cabbage. Best suited for processing soft vegetables, such as those used in salsa. Comes with several useless accessories, so poorly constructed that they create risk of cutting your hand. Accessories were likely included, as an afterthought, to make the product seem more versatile than it really is. Not very ergonomic, when cranking the handle. I give it two stars instead of one because it does an excellent job of making small quantities of salsa, which was my reason for the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Apoiuwerhpga

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this chopper for onions that are going in a ...
customer_reviews.text: This was actually a replacement for another brand that I had used for years but the bowl had cracked. I LOVE this chopper for onions that are going in a soup, stew or chili. I can chop cabbage for slaw in as little as 15 turns of the crank. Even though I have a food processor, I will use the chopper instead. It cleans well and my food prep time is greatly reduced. Great buy and a quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Laretta Geren

customer_reviews.title: Best Chopper Ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this chopper! My previous one was going on 17 years old. I paid $10 for it at a local festival in Southern California. The only thing I use it for is making Pico de Gallo. Had to use plenty of muscle to turn the blade assembly. I would have to do many small batches to get it done. With this new one, I still do small batches but it goes so much faster. In fact, I almost ended up making salsa because I was so used to cranking my old one a good 20 times, ot was almost pureed. Hopefully, this one will last as long.
customer_reviews.author: Frannie Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Great salso maker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to your kitchen. Use to make salsa or other chapped foods that you don't want to chop as fine as in a blender/food processer. I had one before this that had only a single blade system instead of double blades, which I found better than this one, because it's easy to over-do it with this one. A couple or three turns is about all you need. Attachments are pretty useless to me because I have a mandolin that works better, but some people may find them useful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this chopper!
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these about 20 years ago and loved it, but after all these years the blades were dull. So I got this new one and love the attachments that the old one didn’t have. It’s so easy to chop up just a small amount of veggies - don’t have to get out a big food processor.
customer_reviews.author: Janna Montanna

customer_reviews.title: Decent purchase
customer_reviews.text: easy to use but the lid will often pop off even though it is secured on the base. Sharp blade, chops very well, the mixing adaption works well also! The lid holds water when washing so i have to handwash it and lay it one direction to dry, then flip it over.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: its easy to clean up and it does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Went to a home show where they were trying to sell this exact model for about 80$ i was so impressed during the presentation that i almost bite the bullet and went home with it. but my wife reminded me to check amazon and of course it was a huge savings and i had it at my door in just a couple of days. we have been using this for almost every dinner, its easy to clean up and it does what it says. cutting slicing dicing stripping. i really dont know how we cooked before this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great Gadget but Use with Caution
customer_reviews.text: The blades are extremely sharp which is a "double edged sword."...... The blades cut through vegetables with ease but I cut myself by accidentally touching the blades when I cleaned it. I really like this machine and I would recommend it to others......that are more coordinated than I.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sequeira

customer_reviews.title: OMG So glad I foud this
customer_reviews.text: had one of these from somewhere else and I wore it out..lol I so had to have another because its great for making salsa and whipping eggs to make a crazy fluffy omelet(just like waffle house) THANK GOD I found one on here...was hoping it was same quality as the one I had, BOOM!! JUST AS GOOD IF NOT BETTER
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived earlier than expected and in perfect condition. I used it for the first time last night to chop up onions, it took all of a couple minutes to dice up 2 large sweet onions whereas it would have taken me 20-30 minutes before when dicing by hand and knife. I love this product and would HIGHLY recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much just bought this so I could make hash ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much just bought this so I could make hash browns from scratch. It's awesome and a great appliance to add to your kitchen if you like making salsas, guac, potato chips, hashbrowns, etc.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: firm to soft legumes only! Need some power
customer_reviews.text: It’s not good with carrots, mozzarella but for tomatoes, cucumber, small pieces of onions, bell peppers.. it’s ok. Need some power for harder items The best think it can be used without electricity and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: nivin ezzat hanna

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this item a second time
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item again because my wife lost a critical piece to the exact same one she's had for years. She loves it, so I didn't want her to be without one.
customer_reviews.author: Craig & Diane Lunde

customer_reviews.title: It works ... it actually works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have a large food processor I use when it is canning time and the volume of work is extreme. However this little Food chopper absolutely gets the everyday job done quick and efficiently. It is easy to clean up and store. Best of all it works great! Don't know why I didn't have one of these years ago! It makes having Mexican meals so easy from chopping tomatoes and onions to whipping up a batch of salsa in no time!
customer_reviews.author: Salty B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent - easy, very useful
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because we wanted something quick and easy for daily use. We have a big, professional food processor but it's more work putting it together than this. We cook daily and eat a lot of vegetables; this has been great. Easy to use and easy to clean. Be very careful, the blades on this are very, very sharp. Hubby got a cut the the first time we used. It works great and does what it says. We both agree that we'd buy it again and we do highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Love this chopper!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this chopper! Mine fell out of our cabinet and broke badly hitting a ceramic tile floor. My sweet mother bought this replacement for me. We truly wore the original out and needed a new one anyway. Use it ALL THE TIME!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: A kitchen must have!
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about this. My friend suggested I buy one from Tupperware but it was upwards of $40. This one is perfect. It has everything I need and I’ll never need to cry while chopping onions again. An absolute staple in my kitchen. Easy to use and clean. And for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Ocampo

customer_reviews.title: Inspect upon arrival!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it, the handle was broken and missing blades, I returned it. Received the second product, the bowl was cracked, returned it again. Buyer beware, inspect the item upon receipt.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Weak blazes but it still lasted
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in Jan 2014, dumped in Sept. 2017. Reasons: 1) the blazes got rustic seriously. 2) it's very very hard to turn. I still appreciate its work and help for the last 3+ years.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Helps alot in chopping my vegetables with mess-free
customer_reviews.text: i loved the chopper at first i didn't realize how to chop perfectly later i figured it out but very helpful in chopping especially onions and tomatoes.
customer_reviews.author: KRIJAN

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. Purchased one at an in store demo. Then my mother visited and liked it so much we had to find this one on amazon. Tried other similar brands but not as good as this.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Myhill

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Quickest way to make pico! Super easy to use and easy to clean. I do dry the blade immediately after washing to avoid damage to the blade.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: but this does excellent. Only improvement to make it 5 stars would ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think anything could replace my previous hand crank processor, but this does excellent. Only improvement to make it 5 stars would be a chute to drop stuff in without having to remove lid each time...like my previous one had.
customer_reviews.author: J. K.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and portable
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought it ,not sure about durability but chops really fine, just need few rotation. Easy to clean and easy to use. Potable not taking space on kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: Neha Singh

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Does everything as advertised and more! wish I'd have bought this much sooner would have made my time in the kitchen a breeze. A must buy.
customer_reviews.author: YPM

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Not the best product. The food chopper isn’t very sturdy so it’s difficult to turn the handle when there’s food in the container. You really have to hold the whole thing down but it’s small and it’s hard to get a good grip on it while trying to turn the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Li

customer_reviews.title: Easy easy easy
customer_reviews.text: I truly love this piece of kitchen helpfulness! Easy to use, easy to clean, simply fantastic! I use it to chop onions and can get them in any size pieces depending on how long I turn the handle. Great for making salsa, too. So much better than hassling with the giant food processor. Exceedingly happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is spacious and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I usually cook a lot of curries, need chopped onions, tomatos and a lot of veggies every day. This product is just great. Easy to use and good for chopping, squeezing orange juice or shredding cheese!
customer_reviews.author: kj

customer_reviews.title: very sharp.
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool!! I just use the chopper. Blade is very sharp!! I cut myself on Christmas eve when the blade was in the sink. Had to get 7 stitches. Cut the nerve in my right hand and I still don't have any feeling. So please be careful. Don't put this in the sink to wash. Keep the blade separate from your other dishes. Oh, I still love this. It cuts up all the veggies perfect for salsa.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Works great and is so easy to use and clean up!
customer_reviews.text: I have a cuisinart food processor but I hate hauling it out because it's so heavy and clunky so I always reach for this instead. I'm surprised how sharp the blades are. Easy to pop the whole thing in the dishwasher when done.
customer_reviews.author: bluebuoy

customer_reviews.title: Not advised to chop crackers in it works best on softer food
customer_reviews.text: Works well to make salsa and other software foods. Not advised to chop crackers in it works best on softer food. For the value it works well and I would purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: droe

customer_reviews.title: Girl power
customer_reviews.text: Gave this item to my daughter-in-law my granddaughter enjoy helping her granny by using girl power to turn the contraction, I needed a new food processor and reorder this product for myself you can only put small quantities in and be careful not to loose the plug that covers the spout or you will loose products. Had to place foil over the spout for my daughter-in-law food processor because we could not find the spout cover when it hit the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Nette

customer_reviews.title: I don't like it. Of course it will save you some ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't like it. Of course it will save you some time when making big batches of salsa, but as for the rest "functions" it's pretty much useless. Plus the blades are so sharp that you won't even notice how you slice off a piece of your own skin. Of course it should be sharp but you have to think about safe storing as no protection or blades cover are provided and you have to be super attentive when washing those blades.
customer_reviews.author: marimar

customer_reviews.title: A must have in every kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing...absolutely a must to any kitchen everything from chopping tomatoes for salsa to chopping apples for apple pie...this thing does it all.
customer_reviews.author: LadyFrost

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for making Homemade Salsa!
customer_reviews.text: I have an electric one, but purchased this handheld for salsa in particular. And electric processor grinds too much, but a handheld one puts you in control of the cutting. Super easy to clean too!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: It works best if I chop onions
customer_reviews.text: Works really well for salsa. I also used it for egg salad. It works best if I chop onions, peppers, celery, etc. that I would like chopped small and transfer them to a bowl. Then I chop the eggs or tomatoes that I would like chopped a little bigger. I have found that you need to chop the tomatoes and then drain them in a colander or your salsa will have too much liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Janeal Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a while, then not at all.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for a while, but the blades would no longer fit on the base. Maybe it became distorted in the dish-washer or something. None of the attachments will connect to spin now.
customer_reviews.author: Craig G Ballam

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy using this product. Very versatile.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use for making salsa, eggs, chopping veggies, making egg/tuna/chicken, etc salads, juicing. Easy to use. I like that it is manual, does not require electricity. This is our second one. The old one still works, but did not have the attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Rankin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Chopper
customer_reviews.text: This item was recommended to me and I was blown away with how well it chopped! I chopped bell pepper, onion, and chicken, for dinner and this worked so much better then my small electric chopper.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: ... because we are trying to eat healthier and I hate having to get the big food processor down
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because we are trying to eat healthier and I hate having to get the big food processor down, put it together, find the piece I need, etc.... Not to mention the food processor is so LOUD!! The Ultra Chef Express is handy and does a great job. Also it is quiet. The handle seems a little weak but so far it makes it easier for us to do all the chopping and mixing so we can eat healthier.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece
customer_reviews.text: Bought this longer ago than I’d like to admit, but when I went to open it up I’m missing the base piece... make sure it not even worth having. Whoops, my fault for not double checking when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I now have more options
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews, but this gadget has actually changed my eating options. It's so easy and quick to use and clean that I'm making new foods. I put it through its paces by overloading it a little, and it handled this well, so it's relatively durable. This thing is a gem!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cannot live without it !!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased over a dozen of these Salas makers over the past 7 or 8 years. Most of them I have given away as gifts. I keep one in the house and one in the camp trailer for our camping trips. I have worn out at least two or three of them because I use (abuse) them so much. I use tem mainly for making Salsa. I have complete control of how fine or coarse I want each ingredient chopped. I cannot live without it!
customer_reviews.author: K.D. Glantz

customer_reviews.title: I don't use anything except the processor bowl with chopping ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't use anything except the processor bowl with chopping blades. Don't fill more that halfway and chop away. If it is difficukt to turn go backwards and forwards for a few times untilmoves easier. I us it everyday and it is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Marcia S

customer_reviews.title: ok for price
customer_reviews.text: Works best for slicing light duty food. Like cucumbers, celery, tomatoes,etc. Also putting onion chunks in and a little experimenting gets you to diced onion quickly. Grating and other non-cranking is a good way to shred knuckles so did not even try. What works, works! cheap always has limits.
customer_reviews.author: TexasCitizen

customer_reviews.title: Good but handle needs work.
customer_reviews.text: For the price is a decent chopper. But the handle broke within 15 seconds of making egg salad.
customer_reviews.author: GET81

customer_reviews.title: Best salsa maker!
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this again (dropped the bowl of the first one and broke the handle). This is way better than my electric food processor for salsa and quick slicing!
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Niemeier

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this chopper. It is easy to use and clean. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Not durable at all - broke on first use. The plastic engagement parts of the handle are weak and cannot turn against the slightest resistance - like apples. The mechanism fails to turn the blade and just spins skipping over the plastic parts - useless. Had similar devices thatvlastest years on daily use ... do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: LA_Mike

customer_reviews.title: Broke on the first use.
customer_reviews.text: Just like all the other 1 star reviews... the clear plastic bowl cracked on the first use. I was making salsa and following the recipe in the recipe book supplied with the Salsa maker. I have ordered another one to see if it works any better. ...
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Broke on third use!
customer_reviews.text: broke on third use. We purchased two, one for us, one for a family member. Both broke with same symptoms. The gear inside the lid seems to have broken teeth and slips and clicks. I suspect it will be totally broke after two more uses. Did not use when first purchased, cannot return to Amazon. Save your money and don;t buy this junk.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin G

customer_reviews.title: Practical and environmental friendly.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Great for hard vegetables like beets and carrots.
customer_reviews.author: cathy folsom

customer_reviews.title: Best little manual food processor
customer_reviews.text: Best little manual food processor. If you need to cut up small batches of onion, olives, hard boiled eggs, etc. this is a wonder. I use it to scramble eggs, tuna salad, mix salad dress.
customer_reviews.author: Cardmaker in CA

customer_reviews.title: didn’t like
customer_reviews.text: not very easy to clean, the plastic bottom seem to get broken very easily
customer_reviews.author: Tamagogo

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE it.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several of these and a backup for myself in case it ever breaks, but they are rough and tough and do the job in seconds. I have given quite a few as gifts and everyone loves them too; especially for making salsa, tuna, and guacamole. It evenly dices onion, celery, tomato in seconds. The handle goes BOTH ways which is one of the reasons I think it surpasses similar more expensive versions. I LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: colleen matthias

customer_reviews.title: Make your own salsa
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for myself some months ago. This was a gift for someone else and they like myself absolutely love it. It really chops things up as fine as you like. Wonderful for making salsa.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: the kitchen magician
customer_reviews.text: my best purchase ever. I use it almost everyday (and usually for 2-3 things at a time). Super easy to maneuver and superfast too. It takes anywhere from 5 seconds (to dice onions) to 20 seconds (to super finely chop 'em). You can easily chop veggies/onions/tomaotes/potatoes in different sizes as per your needs.The attachments are awesome too. I usually use the julienne grater. Best tool to make the perfect hashbrowns or to get fajita veggies done in seconds.
customer_reviews.author: gunjan dhawan

customer_reviews.title: I love this!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this countless times now and absolutely love it. I literally whipped up some fresh pico in under 5 minutes! The juicer isn't the greatest but everything else is perfect and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Liberty

customer_reviews.title: Super happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this product. Lived on a sailboat for 10 years and wished I'd had this. I'm in an RV now and I use this for lots of things: salsas, slicing potatoes, salad fixings, slaws, etc... I've used it for over a month now and just love it. I mince onions and keep them in an airtight container in the fridge to cook with. Very handy!
customer_reviews.author: Hotspur

customer_reviews.title: I love this! Made perfect salsa without blending it
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Made perfect salsa without blending it . It can chip it super fine so my kids will eat it better but not the blunder mushy way that my blender would. Also I use it for my onions and celery and anything else I need to chop... except it doesn't do too well with hard veggies like carrots. You have to use the slicer for those. But we'll worth it!! Sometimes I use it twice in a day. I hope it stays sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Kymberlee

customer_reviews.title: Make that salsa mix!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little contraption! It’s convenient, easy to use and simple to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ka

customer_reviews.title: A bit clumsy
customer_reviews.text: I expected a lot more from this gadget. It does the chopping but difficult for me to use so I have to have my husband start the first round and then when it’s semi chopped I can operate it.
customer_reviews.author: SHIVALI J.

customer_reviews.title: Received used with no chop blade.
customer_reviews.text: It had food stains in the bowl, scratched and no chop blades.
customer_reviews.author: dymag66

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for making salsa.
customer_reviews.text: My husband makes homemade salsa every week and loves his chopper for perfect chopping. He won’t use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Parnell

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I love it.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love it.. It is ideal for whipping, mixing, slicing, crushing. My tacos are delicious. And I can make meals with natural condiments easily.
customer_reviews.author: HIPOLITO

customer_reviews.title: Food chopper
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit smaller than I had expected. It’s also a little difficult to turn the handle since there’s no grip on the bottom. If there were suction cups to hold it in place it would be much better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Performance dergraded very fast
customer_reviews.text: It worked very well first 8-9 days. After that its performance degraded drastically. This could be just blade loosing sharpness. However,I wasn't expecting it to loose its sharpness so fast. Its still working, however, you have to put more power in it to chop anything. I use it 4 times in a week. Additionally, like others mentioned, handle does appear to be a week point.
customer_reviews.author: Sagar@Amazon

customer_reviews.title: A must!
customer_reviews.text: I love this kitchen tool! I had a similar item for about 10 years and the handle eventually broke. It still worked and I refused to get rid of it. It is just so handy! When I saw this, I had to get it! Truth be told, I have not used it for salsa, but I use it ALL OF THE TIME to slice, chop and dice veggies for everything. It is so quick and easy - as is the clean-up! If you're considering buying this, please don't consider any longer! You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Kate W.

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: Does a lot. I like it and use it. A practical gizmo. Good price too.
customer_reviews.author: NoBull2Day

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price! I am worried it will not last long as the gears inside are already slipping after about 10 uses. Capacity is great; easily makes a med-lrg bowl of guacamole or salsa !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!!! Food Prep in the kitchen got so much easier and considerable faster than fast with this food chopper. If anyone has a lot of chopping, whether fruits and veggies or meat, I would definitely say this chopper cuts down the time and work leaving a lot more time for other things.
customer_reviews.author: by: W. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, not all the attachements work well together. I can't recommend spending money on this
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chopper!
customer_reviews.text: My Mexican family has been chopping up salsa veggies the good old fashion way for years but now it literally takes just seconds to make salsa. My mom and even grandma love it so much as do I and now I don't have to deal with chopping up onions, peppers or even tomatoes one by one. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: convenient
customer_reviews.text: I've only used one time, but it was easy to use and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Karen J

customer_reviews.title: Great little chopper with lots of accessories
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chopper to take camping. Easy to use and clean. Made fresh salsa at the campsite!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd order for my family and friends. A must have in every kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Ollycat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Salsa Maker
customer_reviews.text: Bought this along with "The Great Salsa Book". Does a fantastic job of making the right consistency of any salsa you desire. Plus many other uses. A very handy device to have around the kitchen. Would also make a great gift, along with the book to give to any Salsa lover.,
customer_reviews.author: Mt.. Jumper

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was just as described. It works exceptionally well. Blades are extremely sharp. I use it every other day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Ultra Chef Express Food Chopper – 7 in 1 Chopper, Mixer, Blender, Whipper, Slicer, Shredder and Juicer
product_meta.description: Ultra Chef Express Food Chopper - Chop, Blend, Whip, Mix, Slice, Shred, Julienne, and Juice - An amazing food chopper and so much more! Anyone can produce perfect results quickly and easily. There is no skill involved, no strength required, and no complicated steps to learn. The Ultra Chef Express is a 7 in 1 kitchen gadget that will save you time and effort when preparing all sorts of foods. It's indispensable as a chopper, but with the collection of extra parts it comes with, you can also whip, juice, shred, slice and more. Make hash browns for breakfast, mix up a meatloaf for dinner, chop onions without any tears, prepare salsa, mix cake batter, the possibilities are nearly endless with this powerful tool. Just turn the crank to spin the blades, and anything inside will cut with ease. Thanks to the super sharp blades, and precise, manual operation, you can easily achieve any consistency you want. Spin a few times for large chunks, spin more for smaller ones, and keep on turning if you want to puree the food inside. The clear bowl allows you to see exactly what's going on, and the sealed chamber contains smells and messes that would otherwise annoy you. This deluxe chopper comes with many additional attachments to add to its usefulness, so it's much more than a chopping tool. Get it to dice onions and tomatoes with incredible speed and accuracy, but then experiment with the other parts to discover all of the other tasks it can handle.
feature_bullets: DESIGN – Our triple bladed Samurai chopping blades are made of surgical stainless steel that won’t bend or rust and are designed for fast and even chopping. Equipped with an anti-skid base, handle, and pouring spout, our 5 cup bowl has the largest capacity on the market. Don’t settle for choppers with inferior blades and short pull cords that snap. Our chopper features an oversized crank making it safer, more durable and easier to control for desired results.

ALL IN ONE – Not just a food chopper, the Ultra Chef Express is an all in one kitchen tool. Along with the chopper, the Ultra Chef Express comes equipped with 3 mandoline inserts, whipping blade, egg white separator, storage lid, juicer insert, safety food holder and recipe book. The mandoline inserts feature a slicer blade, julienne blade and shredder blade.

VERSATILE – Perfect for slicing vegetables, chopping nuts, herbs, salsa, hummus, guacamole and more. Chop onions in seconds without crying and garlic without stinking up the kitchen. Chop veggies, whip eggs for omelets, shred cheese, make hash browns and juice oranges all with one tool! Manual operation allows you to achieve the consistency you want. Spin a few times for large chunks, spin more for smaller ones, and keep on turning if you want to puree the food.

SAFE & CONVENIENT – A great alternative to electric food choppers, that can be bulky, noisy, expensive and hard to clean. The chopper’s components come apart for easy cleaning. Just rinse with water after use and drip dry. Blades are concealed during operation for utmost safety. Included food safety holder grips food safely and securely allowing you to chop every last bit without risking a finger. Chopper and all parts are made from BPA free food safe plastic.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – For over 25 years we have been manufacturing and providing the best products and services to our customers at the lowest prices possible. We are so confident that you’ll absolutely love our Ultra Chef Express Food Chopper that we will stand behind our product with a replacement or your money back! Every Ultra Chef Express Food Chopper purchase comes with a manufacturer’s limited lifetime warranty, so you can buy with confidence!
